usbsimulator.util module

usbsimulator.util.bit_stuff(data: list[int])[source]

Perform bit stuffing for USB packet

Parameters:

data (list[int]) – the data to apply the bit stuffing on

Returns:

the bit stuffed packet

Return type:

list[int]

usbsimulator.util.bit_mirror(data: int, size: int = None)[source]

Perform bit mirroring on data assuming a size bits long integer

Parameters:

  • data (int) – the integer to perform the bit mirroring on.

  • size (int or None) – The size to assume to perform the bit mirroring. If the size is None, then the actual size in bits is taken.

Returns:

the integer, bit mirrored

Return type:

int

usbsimulator.util.to_bits(data: int, size: int)[source]

Returns the bits of the int assuming a size bits number

Parameters:

  • data (int) – The integer to convert

  • size (int) – The size of the integer in bits

Returns:

A list of bits, MSB first

Return type:

list[int]
